00030 NITF_CXX_GUARD
00039 typedef struct _nitf_TRECursor
00040 {
00041     /* DO NOT TOUCH THESE! */
00042     int numItems;               /* holds the number of descPtr items */
00043     int index;                  /* holds the current index to process */
00044     int looping;                /* keeps track of how deep we are in the loops */
00045     nitf_IntStack *loop;        /* holds loopcount for each level of loops */
00046     nitf_IntStack *loop_idx;    /* holds the indexes for each level of loops (arrays) */
00047     nitf_IntStack *loop_rtn;    /* holds the endloop bookmark for each level of loops */
00048     nitf_TRE *tre;              /* the TRE associated with this cursor */
00049 
00050     /* YOU CAN REFER TO THE MEMBERS BELOW IN YOUR CODE */
00051     nitf_TREDescription *prev_ptr; /* holds the previous description */
00052     nitf_TREDescription *desc_ptr;      /* pointer to the current nitf_TREDescription */
00053     char tag_str[256];          /* holds the fully qualified tag name of the current tag */
00054     int length;                 /* the length of the field
00055                                      * This should be used over the TREDescription length because
00056                                      * the field may need to be computed. This will contain the
00057                                      * actual, possibly computed length. */
00058 }
00059 nitf_TRECursor;
